data.message: Eminem i'll be honest I never liked hip hop music, I like old rock and roll from the 1970s, but I will say you are the best rapper of all times, I got to like you! I love that song "I'm not afraid" I'm glad you a re drug free, and not afraid of your management anymore. we love you. God bless.

replies.message: To be honest dog, if you're any bit of a fan of hip hop you can't deny Eminem's movement and intelligence in the game. And for those who don't listen to no rap, even them if you actually looked at what Eminem did and his brilliants, you should be able to tell he was one of the greatest to ever do it. And I'm not just saying that cause I'm a huge fan, but that's the truth
everything you're saying I concur I loved me some Idol, Motley, ACDC, Adam Ant and many more

Relapse 11 Take it from me he weird ok . I liked his rape song but don't ever trust that Mfucgk he's weird. I sold him an elephant that he's training to spew up on an audience so buy a face mask if u go to one of his shows specially if you get old .....
